fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: A spirit realm fox. They are able to control the emotions of a player. Your target may not perform actions on any players they have previously performed one on the following night.

fields.name: Message:
fields.value: "You have developed hatred for [insert former ability targets here], you may not target them again tomorrow"

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Cannot perform the factional kill and use ability the same night
